ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Singular vs. Plural?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m not Eric, but I use plurals myself to maintain the hierarchical relationship -- the collection is /places/, a particular place is /places/xyz. Similar

On 11/9/06, Mike Schinkel <mikeschinkel@...> wrote:

> >> http://example.org/places/{place}
> >> http://example.org/people/{person}
>
> In your example, you used the plural of "place/places" and
> "person/people." Can you example why you chose plural, and the
> pros and  cons for singular vs. plural?

I'm not Eric, but I use plurals myself to maintain the
hierarchical relationship -- the collection is /places/, a
particular place is /places/xyz. Similar to files in a directory
(though I emphatically don't think of the Web as a filesystem).

Cheers,
Justin
